screen-one.intro-text: Thanks for being there and reading my gig details. As the title of the gig suggests I am a Front end Developer & offering my expertise in Angular App Website Development.

quote-2.text: He is able to raise required technology, skill or domain specific knowledge in a very short time. I'm not even speaking about his human quality. He really reliable person and just nice guy!

quote-1.text: Working with Pavel at ITREX Group as a tech lead for a project for approximately 2 years I cannot remember any other person with such truly phenomenal persistence, responsibility, and hardworking. I was observing Pavel making tremendous progress in his technical and soft skills every day.
quote-1.author: Oleksandr Buchek
